portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, do you have any s?

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: ボクは、が 大好物でね、

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: この世の 全てのを 独占したいんだよ
portrait_l.ascii: I want to own every in the world.

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: きみの持っている 、全部買う 売ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: I'll buy any s you have. Sell 'em to me.

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, do you have any s?

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: アレは、すきま風を 防ぐのに最適なんだ
portrait_l.ascii: They're great for stopping drafts from coming in.

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: 僕の夢はね、 自分１人で作った家に 住むことだったんだよ
portrait_l.ascii: You know, my dream is to live in a house build by my own hands.

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: 一通り、出来たんだけど あっちこっちにすきまがあって 家族もカンカンさ
portrait_l.ascii: I've built one before, but there were cracks everywhere, and my family made a big deal out of it.

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: きみの持っている 、全部買う 売ってくれ

sjis.weapon_type: って、 あの手触り、たまらないよね ハァハァだよね

ascii.weapon_type: you know, the way they feel is irresistable. It'l take your breath away.

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: きみの持っている 、ハァハァ 売ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: I'll buy any s you have. *pant* Sell 'em to me.

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: 最近、一部のマニアの間では、 良い値で、売れるんだよね
portrait_l.ascii: They've gotten popular with some people and can fetch a high price.

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: あ、ルート持ってない素人じゃ 無理だからプロのボクに任せてね
portrait_l.ascii: Ah, it's impossible for an amateur to figure out how to do it, so leave it to a pro like me.

portrait_l.name: wanted man
portrait_l.sjis: きみの持っている 、全部買う 売ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: I'll buy every you have. Sell 'em to me.
